body:
## What's Changed
* Add parameter `--output-dir` and `--generate-name` for `helm:template` by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/263
* Fix handling of `helm:template` with `additionalArguments`, fix #260 by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/261
* Replace test.txt in invoker tests with valid yaml file by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/262

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/compare/6.6.0...6.6.1

We refactored some internals of this plugin. Notable changes:
* directories with spaces are now working
* support `--force-update` for `helm repo add`
* support `--quiet` for `helm lint`
If you encounter any problems with this version please open an issue.

## What's Changed
* Remove duplicate method for better testing by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/231
* Remove unused method `formatIfValueIsNotEmpty` by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/233
* Move checkstyle linter to its own job by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/232
* Move chartVersion timestamp handling to package mojo by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/234
* Move some methods to upload mojo by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/236
* Rewrite unit tests and add missing tests by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/237
* Bump mockito-core from 4.8.0 to 4.8.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/242
* Bump commons-compress from 1.21 to 1.22 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/243
* Bump version for new feature release by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/241
* Bump jackson-databind from 2.13.4.1 to 2.13.4.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/244
* Remove `commons-io` by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/239
* Support flag `--force-update` for `helm repo add`, fix #127 by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/238
* Remove `junit-jupiter-engine` and `junit-jupiter-params` by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/240
* Refactor `getChartDirectories` by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/246
* Update `pom.xml` by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/245
* Replace `String` parameters with `File` where possible by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/248
* Refactor internal file handling, replace `String` with `Path` by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/249
* Refactor handling of process streams by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/253
* Use local executable in tests by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/250
* Remove `commons-lang3` by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/251
* Refactor tests, capture commands at `Runtime.getRuntime().exec(...)` by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/252
* Refactor tests to include deprecated parameters by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/254
* Refactor handling of flags, use space instead of equality sign by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/255
* Refactor handling of helm executable, now encapsulated in wrapper class by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/256
* Add  option for `helm lint --quiet` by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/259
* Remove `StripSensitiveDataLog`, the plugin does not log secrets anymore by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/258
* Refactor invoker tests, add test for #nope by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/257


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/compare/6.5.0...6.6.0

## What's Changed

* Add javadoc for parameter, add help goal, fix #222 by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/230
* Remove illegal usage of `@Parameter`, fix #221 by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/225
* Add deprecations. by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/224
* Cleanup abstract mojo, move parameter to goals where they are used by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/226
* Disable failfast on matrix builds by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/228
* Add checkstyle for testclasses by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/229


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/compare/6.4.2...6.5.0

Bumped jackson to avoid jackson issue [https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-jjjh-jjxp-wpff](https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-jjjh-jjxp-wpff).

## What's Changed

* Bump jackson-databind from 2.13.4 to 2.13.4.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/223


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/compare/6.4.1...6.4.2

## What's Changed
* Do not display k8sCluster warning if nothing is configured. Fix #219 by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/220
* Update actions and linter by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/218
* Bump jackson-databind from 2.13.3 to 2.13.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/216
* Bump maven-jar-plugin from 3.2.2 to 3.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/214
* Bump version.org.junit.jupiter from 5.9.0 to 5.9.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/215
* Bump mockito-core from 4.7.0 to 4.8.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/213
* Bump tidy-maven-plugin from 1.1.0 to 1.2.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/217

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/compare/6.4.0...6.4.1

## What's Changed
* Add global helm flags to Base Abstract Mojo by @nazarovkv in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/194
* Add "helm upgrade" Function by @nikmaster in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/212
* Bump crazy-max/ghaction-import-gpg from 4 to 5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/199
* Bump maven-invoker-plugin from 3.2.2 to 3.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/198
* Bump jackson-databind from 2.13.2.2 to 2.13.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/196
* Bump mockito-core from 4.5.1 to 4.6.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/197
* Bump mockito-core from 4.6.0 to 4.6.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/203
* Bump maven-release-plugin from 3.0.0-M5 to 3.0.0-M6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/204
* Bump maven-install-plugin from 3.0.0-M1 to 3.0.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/208
* Bump maven-deploy-plugin from 3.0.0-M2 to 3.0.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/206
* Bump version.org.junit.jupiter from 5.8.2 to 5.9.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/205
* Bump maven-resources-plugin from 3.2.0 to 3.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/207
* Bump mockito-core from 4.6.1 to 4.7.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/211
* Bump maven-checkstyle-plugin from 3.1.2 to 3.2.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/210
* Bump maven-javadoc-plugin from 3.4.0 to 3.4.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/209

## New Contributors
* @nikmaster made their first contribution in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/212

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/compare/6.3.0...6.3.1

## What's Changed
* Update versions and add dependabot. by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/190
* Refactor tests for init. by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/187
* Add auth if helm binary url requires auth. #171 by @nazarovkv in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/191


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/compare/6.2.0...6.3.0

## What's Changed
* Map arch `aarch64` (Apple M1) to `amd64`. Fix #129. by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/182
* Mark all mojos threadsafe. Fix #87 by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/184
* Centralized helm config & cache, added --debug flag. by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/183
* [Push goal] Load credentials via settings.xml file by @SpacePh in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/186
* Add codeowners. by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/189

## New Contributors
* @SpacePh made their first contribution in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/186

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/compare/6.1.1...6.2.0

## What's Changed
* Fix push mojo using login. Fix #178 by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/180
* Align codestyle with kokuwa checkstyle. by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/174
* Add checkstyle to enforce rules. by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/175
* Reviewed lombok usage. by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/177
* Remove dead code. by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/181

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/compare/6.1.0...6.1.1

## What's Changed
* Set correct maven prerequisites and pin maven dependencies. by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/165
* Strip secrets from log statements. by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/166
* Add capability to push to OCI registry by @mlkmhd in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/169
* Change `dependency-build`goal from phase `prepare-package` to `process-resources`. Fix #81 by @slawekjaranowski in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/168
* Use helm version from github tags. Fix #170 by @sschnabe in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/173

## New Contributors
* @mlkmhd made their first contribution in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/169

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/compare/6.0.0...6.1.0

Changed groupId from `com.kiwigrid` to `io.kokuwa.maven` because @kokuwaio is the new maintainer of this plugin.
Changed default branch to **main**, **master** contains last version from old maintainer @Kiwigrid.

## What's Changed
* Rename from Kiwigrid to Kokuwa. by @stephanschnabel in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/152
* Set java-version in actions to 8. by @stephanschnabel in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/153
* Check empty k8sToken before replace, fixes #151. by @stephanschnabel in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/154
* Add simple it test with init and lint. by @stephanschnabel in https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/pull/156

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kokuwaio/helm-maven-plugin/compare/helm-maven-plugin-5.11...6.0.0

name: helm-maven-plugin-5.11
body:
- Timestamp as version.
- Multiple YAML Values Support.
- GitHub Actions: build on Pull Requests.

name: helm-maven-plugin-5.10
body:
- Update badges
- Introduce GitHub Workflows
- Introduce Linters
- Project Makeover
- Add Nexus support to README
- K8S Authentication
- Additional tests
- Artifactory repo: support upload by groupId
- Add template feature
- Bump commons-compress from 1.19 to 1.21
- Use maven's settings.xml server credentials even for CHARTMUSEUM repos
nexus authentication from settings.xml #115
fix(io): avoid blocking IO in callCli() #121

name: helm-maven-plugin-5.7
body: - Update to stable Helm repository URL

name: helm-maven-plugin-5.6
body:
__Release Notes 5.6__

* Optional configuration `helm.chartVersion`
* Enhanced linting with ability to override values
* Added repository type for Nexus
Automatically download right binaries depends on the platform and version.

Ensure plugin can process charts under symlinked directories (#76)
Fix InitMojoTest on Mac OS (#80)
Add `--generate-name` flag for `dry-run` goal
support basic auth on CHARTMUSEUM type based on helm repository username and password
Introducing an option to disable adding of stable repo.

name: Welcome Helm v3
body:
From version 5.0 Helm v3 is required. There is no longer support for Helm v2. For convenience reasons the stable repo is added by default.

Helm v2 users can still use plugin version 4.13.
Handle null streams when uploading charts was not successful.
Add support for Windows
Only succeed when HTTP status is 2xx, while uploading artifacts.
Ignore file permission change if unsupported by filesystem
add pattern matching for exclusions
Also run helm init when using local binary
Avoid systemtools wget, mkdir and tar and use plain java instead.
Fixes dry-run goal which actually performed an install instead of simulate it.
add force-local option in tar command to cope with colon for windows system
Add option to auto-detect `helm` from `PATH` if `useLocalHelmBinary` is enabled.
Support usage of local HELM installation.
Print warning if no Charts found

Add detailed skip flags
Inspired by https://github.com/spotify/dockerfile-maven/blob/master/docs/usage.md#skip-docker-goals-bound-to-maven-phases
Flag to skip plugin execution
Custom packaging - binds a couple of plugin goals to the Maven lifecycle.
Add support for encrypted passwords in settings.xml
